trans-unit.source: Represents a complete, in-memory description of the service, including all the endpoints for the service and specifications for their respective addresses, bindings, contracts and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma descrição completa, dentro da memória do serviço, incluindo todos os pontos finais para o serviço e as especificações para os respetivos endereços, enlaces, contratos e comportamentos.

trans-unit.source: The information contained in the ServiceDescription is used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system to building the run-time components for the service.
trans-unit.target: As informações contidas na ServiceDescription são utilizadas pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sistema para criar os componentes de tempo de execução para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando adicionar comportamentos personalizados para expandir <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: Através de programação, tem <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>o comportamento de serviço personalizado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>antes quando chamar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>método no <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> methods are available to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29>métodos estão disponíveis para refletir no comportamentos utilizando o [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] modelo de programação quando substituir <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>com que possui o mecanismo de alojamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: Exportar os metadados sobre um ponto final de serviço através da transmissão <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>como um parâmetro para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, or one of the other export methods provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property to return the collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar este método, ou uma das outras exportar métodos fornecidos pela <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>, utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A>propriedade para devolver a coleção de <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>objetos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class from a specified enumeration of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> classe a partir de uma enumeração de pontos finais de serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> used to initialize the service description.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> do tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>utilizada para inicializar a descrição do serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: endpoints is .
trans-unit.target: endpointsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os comportamentos associados ao serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando adicionar comportamentos personalizados para expandir <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the Behaviors prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: Através de programação, tem <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>o comportamento de serviço personalizado para os comportamentos antes de quando chamar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>método no <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objeto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The type of behavior that is accessible from the description hierarchy is scoped to the specific level.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de comportamento que seja acessível a partir da hierarquia de descrição é confinado ao nível do específico.

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>está acessível.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: If you want access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> associated with an endpoint instead, you can obtain the endpoints for the service using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende aceder a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>associado a um ponto final em vez disso, pode obter os pontos finais para o serviço utilizando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Then retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria, and call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> property to obtain the collection of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> objects.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>da coleção com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>método que utiliza os critérios de pesquisa relevantes e chamada o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>propriedade para obter a coleção do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>objetos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> that contains the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> do tipo <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"> </xref> que contém os comportamentos associados ao serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <<xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""></xref>> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do < <xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""> </xref> > elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This name is not coupled to our configuration model.
trans-unit.target: Este nome não está integrado para o nosso modelo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This is used by service host base to wire up the service.
trans-unit.target: Isto é utilizado pelo anfitrião do serviço base para ligar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The configuration name is a required string attribute for the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: O nome da configuração é um atributo de cadeia necessária para o [ \< serviço\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The name of the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do [ \< serviço\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) elemento de configuração utilizado para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of endpoints from the service description.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos finais da descrição de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection> returned by this method each contain the address, binding, contract, and behavior information required to communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: Pontos finais de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>devolvido por este método de cada uma contém as informações de endereço, o enlace, o contrato e o comportamento necessárias para comunicar com o serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To access this information, you must retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria.
trans-unit.target: Para aceder a estas informações, tem de obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>da coleção com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>método que utiliza os critérios de pesquisa relevantes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> properties can be used to access the information.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>propriedades podem ser utilizadas para aceder às informações.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>é acedida pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: Exportar os metadados sobre um ponto final de serviço através da transmissão <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>como um parâmetro para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that contains the endpoints defined for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"> </xref> que contém os pontos finais definidos para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma descrição de serviço inicializada com um objeto de serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para refletir no comportamentos utilizando o [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] modelo de programação quando substituir <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>com que possui o mecanismo de alojamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service and adds any relevant service behaviors to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetService inicializa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>Propriedades, garantindo que as <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>está ligado ao serviço e adiciona quaisquer comportamentos de serviço relevantes para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que implementa o serviço.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service object provided.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> para o objeto de serviço fornecido.

trans-unit.source: serviceImplementation is .
trans-unit.target: serviceImplementationis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma descrição de serviço foi inicializada com um tipo de serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para refletir no comportamentos utilizando o [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] modelo de programação quando substituir <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>com que possui o mecanismo de alojamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, reflects on the type for any the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> objects and adds them to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service.
trans-unit.target: GetService inicializa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>Propriedades, reflete o tipo para qualquer o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>objetos e adiciona-lhes <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>e assegura que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>está ligado ao serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do serviço.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service type provided.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> para o tipo de serviço fornecido.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do serviço.

trans-unit.source: If the name is `null`, this property returns the name of the service type.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome for `null`, esta propriedade devolve o nome do tipo de serviço.

trans-unit.source: If service type is also `null`, it returns the default service name.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de serviço é também `null`, devolve o nome de serviço predefinido.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Name maps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element local name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ao exportar metadados WSDL, o nome mapeia para o Web Service desenvolvimento Language (WSDL) `service`> parte do nome local de elemento de (qualificado) `name` atributo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço de nomes para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Namespacemaps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element namespace name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ao exportar metadados WSDL, o Namespacemaps para o Web Service desenvolvimento Language (WSDL) `service`> parte de nome de espaço de nomes de elemento (qualificado) do `name` atributo.

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do serviço.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Type>que implementa o serviço.</xref:System.Type>
